titles.title: 777 To All The Nations (easy familiar tune nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To all the nations
This is God's command
Go and preach the gospel
Throughout every land
Christ who died on Calv'ry
Bids us go today
And He lives in heaven
For His church to pray

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
To all the nations
This is God's command
Go and preach the gospel
Throughout every land

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To all the nations
Preaching Christ abroad
As the Lord and Savior
Spotless Lamb of God
Let us bear our witness
Confident and clear
With the Spirit's boldness
We need never fear

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To all the nations
In the Spirit's power
For the foes of darkness
Challenge every hour
But the Lord has promised
That His Church shall be
Built in every nation
Glorious and free

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To all the nations
Till our Lord appear
All the signs around us
Signal He is near
Christ will come in power
His great glory show
Then the earth in splendor
Will His freedom know
